metadata.title: CVE-2018-20182 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Buffer Overflow overthe global variables in the function seamless_process_line() that resultsin memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
